author: Thomas Bardwell
title: Amazon Games’ Ambitious MMO ‘New World’ Suffers Pandemic Delay
description: Amazon Game Studios' ambitious New World MMO is the latest title to suffer delays due to the impact of the coronavirus pandemic. The post Amazon Games’ Ambitious MMO ‘New World’ Suffers Pandemic Delay appeared first on CCN.com
content:
• Amazon Game Studios has delayed the launch of the upcoming MMO, New World.
  • The title was due for release this May, but will now arrive in August.
  • The developer cites the impact of remote work on the pace of development as the reason be… [+1924 chars]
